Field Label: Active User Account?
New User Information
Required User Information

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_name', a.value, NULL)),    ' (',   max(if(a.field_name = 'region_code', a.value, NULL)),   ') ' ) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=59099  GROUP BY a.record  ORDER BY value

Field Label: IeDEA Hub Access

IeDEA Hub Permissions
What permissions should this user have on the Hub?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, No Access | 1, View-only access | 2, Submit comments for the region (key investigator access) | 3, Vote for the region (PI-level access)

Section Header: Who is making this New User Request?

Field Label: I want to put these in the project, but don't want to take the risk of emailing any of these people by mistake.

These fields are only editable by an IeDEA Hub Admin. Please contact stephany.duda@vanderbilt.edu with CC to your regional PI if you need a change to these fields. Email: [email] REDCap username (optional): [redcap_name] Active account?: [active_y] Assigned IeDEA region: [person_region] Access level: [harmonist_regperm]

Secure Data Access

Allow user to download secure data
If this option is selected, the user will be included in a list of people who can be given access to download patient-level data for specified concept sheets.
Harmonist Access

Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Edit/Finalize data requests | 2, Create new concept sheets | 3, Edit concept sheets | 4, Edit requests | 5, Upload file revisions | 6, Edit the data model ('Harmonist 0' Projects) | 7, Edit Deadlines & Events (Home page) | 8, Edit tblCENTER | 9, Add news items | 10, Edit publications
